arStrings.szText: This is Osric's doing. I watched him butcher innocents in Caldeum, and instead of stopping him, I walked away.
Edgar talking through his difficult decision to return to Caldeum and face Osric.
I used to be a Knight. You probably figured that out already. I left the day I rescued Suna. I should have saved more.
If I had killed him instead of fleeing the city, these people might still live.
I will flee no longer. I'm going back in for Osric. If it costs me my life, well... I owe that much and more.
Very well. Let us deliver justice together.
relieved that the hero has offered to join. feeling a little hopeful
